title: Coinbase Prime hot wallet leads weekly Bitcoin trading with $11.4 billion volume
description:
Coinbase Prime, the crypto platform explicitly designed for institutional investors, trusts, and high-net-worth individuals, has seen a dramatic increase in trading activity following the U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs launch. CryptoSlate analysis identified a hot wallet at Coinbase Prime that has surged to the top of the Bitcoin inflow chart over the past week. This wallet, […]

The post Coinbase Prime hot wallet leads weekly Bitcoin trading with $11.4 billion volume appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: A 2021 Crypto Fund Manager’s Tale of Surviving the ‘Widowmaker Trade’
description: Offering a unique insider perspective, David Choi chronicles his encounter with arguably the most notorious trade in crypto’s history. title: Crypto exchange HashKey secures major investment for diverse expansion
description: HashKey, a Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency exchange, has successfully raised approximately $100 million in a Series A funding round, achieving a pre-money valuation of over $1.2 billion.  This significant capital injection marks a pivotal moment for the company, which plans to allocate the funds towards various strategic initiatives within its business arms.  While the exact identity […]

title: Ethereum Rival Priced at $0.08 set to match the market cap of ETH
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrency, disruptive innovations and competitive pricing are key drivers of market dynamics. One such emerging player, poised to challenge the dominance of Ethereum, is Retik Finance, currently priced at an accessible $0.08.  As of writing, Retik is in its presale stage 6, having impressively raised over $9.5 million. This article […]

title: Dubai-based OKX subsidiary granted a license by VARA
description: In significant development within the cryptocurrency industry, OKX Middle East Fintech FZE, the global cryptocurrency exchange OKX subsidiary, has secured a license from the Dubai Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA).  This pivotal milestone allows OKX to expand its cryptocurrency services, including fiat transactions, spot services, and spot pairs, targeting institutional and qualified retail customers in […]

title: Avalanche (AVAX) Inscriptions Explode with Over 100 Million Tokens Minted
description: Inscriptions on the Avalanche blockchain are reported to have surpassed 100 million since June 2023.  Threat actors’ attempt to take advantage of the growing interest in ASC-20 was exposed by the AVAX developers.  Inscriptions based on the Avalanche blockchain (ASC-20) seem to follow the directions of the Bitcoin Ordinals and inscription tokens (BRC-20) as they [...]

title: SEC Agrees to Push Do Kwon’s Trial, Awaits Judge Rakoff’s Decision
description:
In a recent development in the SEC-Terraform legal tussle, the Securities and Exchange Commission has agreed to delay the civil trial involving Terraform Labs and its co-founder, Do Kwon. The regulator’s move is in response to Do Kwon’s request for the postponement of the trial to mid-March. In February 2023, the SEC charged Terraform Labs […]

The post SEC Agrees to Push Do Kwon’s Trial, Awaits Judge Rakoff’s Decision appeared first on Coin Edition.
